description: Brett's best friend is Trevor. Trevor's best friend is sex. This sex is always and usually with a chick. Brett, however, heard through the grapevine that Trevor has been known to fuck a dude once in awhile. And Brett knew that his best friend, Trevor was hung as hell---talking 9.5inches! As soon as Trevor's girlfriend was out of town, Brett swooped in, bent over, spread his cheeks and took an anal pounding that practically split him in two pieces.
title: Just A Little Bit
